amendment.description: An amendment numbered 34 printed in Part B of House Report 118-535 to increase and decrease funding for the Board of Veterans Appeals to prioritize increasing processing speed for veteran casework.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A019) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A019) Agreed to by voice vote.
